Someday i with to become a famous animator and work for a big company like dreamworks.
I m a graphic designer.
My inspiration is clasical music.
Drawing in traditional style is my pasion.

participant_2.background:
I m headed to university of michigan in the fall.
My favorite season is summer.
I just graduated high school.
I love tacos but hate spaghetti.
I want to be a doctor when i graduate.

content.text: What do you want to do after you graduate?
I want to be a doctor.
Oh cool! Me too! I'm a graphic designer and I want to work for a big company like Dreamworks.
That's awesome! What kind of art do you like to do?
I love drawing in traditional style. I'm inspired by classical music.
That's really cool! I'm not very artistic, but I love art. I'm especially a fan of tacos.
Tacos are great! I'm not a big fan of spaghetti, but I love tacos.
I can't wait to go to college in the fall. I'm excited to start a new chapter in my life.
I know what you mean! I'm excited to start my career and see where it takes me.
I'm sure you'll do great things. You're clearly very talented and passionate about your work.
Thanks! I appreciate that. I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Me too! I know it's going to be bright for both of us.
